answers.answer: Hi,I am afraid this is not the correct forum for your question--we deal with questions related to diabetes and endocrine diseases here.Please speak with your doctor soon about your concerns and abstain from intercourse until you do so.Take care.

question: I married from 2 yearsSince I married I never had sex with other girlsAfter one year married I see some red  pimple on the head of my penis I went to the doctor in that time and I made blood test the result is I have Chlamydia then the doctor gave me 2 box of remedy one for me and for my wife each box   6 tablet 2 every 12 hoursThe red pimple on the head of my penis now is disappearedBut from several months I have red spot on the head of my penis also there some of pain on red spot on the head of my penis after I have sex
title: red spot on the head of my penis
